reviews.sentence: nice. We stayed at the hotel for two nights during a short holiday in Hamburg. The hotel is very clean the rooms are spacy and the staff is perfect and very helpful. This hotel has a nice wellness area pool gym and sauna. The pool area is great. The sauna area is somewhat small. So the sauna is nice to use when you are at the hotel anyway but ist is not worth booking the hotel just because of the sauna facilitites. We booked the Treudelberg arrangement vis the hotels homepage which seem a good value for money. The hotel is located 10min by car to Popenbüteler s train station. You can also take a bus there. It is about 30min by train to Hamburg city center without changing trains. The hotel has a quite spacious golf course.

Beautiful hotel. but. This hotel looks lovely and is very clean the staff were also very friendly and helpful. We paid for a larger room as there were three of us including our son who is very tall over 6 feet. The room was big enough for our needs. Unfortunately none of us managed much sleep over the two nights as the room was far too hot even with both windows open making it noisy between 060 and 230 due to proximity of airport. This may just have been our room that was on the 3rd floor above the pool area. We did not eat at the hotel as it looked expensive and both my husband and son are fussy eaters.

Business Trip. Warm welcome from friendly reception staff nice rooms. Mini bar well stocked with water snacks. did not get a chance to enjoy the spa facilities or golf course but would happily visit again. Nice bar food and local beers on tap. Quiet bar area but clean and good service.
Pleasant. Room and surrounding nice. Breakfast and personnel.

Excellent on all levels. Perfect hotel perfect location amazing breakfast with so much choice great friendly and polite staff very dog friendly cosy comfy rooms great fitness centre and really great relaxing pool will stay there again.

Great family place. Big rooms Junior suite great facilities high service nice pool area and very friendly staff. Easy check in and check out. Staff great with the kids. Food was excellent too great value for money. Easy to get into the city by bus just outside and train from Popenbütler S Station. Great shopping at Alstertal Einkaufszentrum very close by. Easy to get there from the freeway.

As nice as it was 15 years ago. I have stayed in this hotel more than 10 times in the period 193 202 with my parents while they were travelling for work. The hotel was in that time real high class a fancy golf hotel. Coming back to the hotel now you see that not a lot has changed and I mean it in a positive way. The hotel is still beautiful in a traditional style. They have added a new part in the hotel called atrium where you can find beautiful modern rooms. The restaurant is relocated in the golf clubhaus. But everything is still good taken care of as it was in the past. The hotel does not feel so high class anymore the hotel market has improved a lot in 15 years but that did not matter that much. The spa swimming pool is really like it was before. Not a lot has changed but it was all clean. Connection to Hamburg is easy take a bus and next the S bahn in Popenbutel. Hotel is highly recommended for a city trip with a nice spa break. Enjoy the walk through the woods and around the golf terrain.

Golf and gourmet. We had a wonderful stay with gourmet menus and lovely golf. The hotel Landhaus is a very nice place to stay With excellent rooms and friendly staff. There were unfortunately a lot of noisy children at the same time. With southern winds there are a lot of noise on the courses from landing airplanes at the nearby airport.
Nice room good breakfast great conferencing and stunning views.
Excellent facility in a quite location with very spacious and comfortable rooms. Rooms are very spacious and comfortable. Nothing.

Golf resort in Germany. Fantastic food. 11 points out of 10. We had 3 lunches and 3 dinners. All excellent. The golf suites beginners and medium players. The three 9hole loops are all well maintained. The greens are very good.

Nice and peaceful. Stayed there for the conference. Generally a good impression. Room was very clean and quiet but a bit too warm. But there was one big BUT for me. room on the ground floor feels like there is no privacy at all. When you open the french window for a fresh air you hear every conversation on the parking lot and in the yard and you can be seen by anyone from there. Not a comfortable feeling.

Nice and peaceful. Stayed there for the conference. Generally a good impression. Room was very clean and quiet but a bit too warm. But there was one big BUT for me. room on the ground floor feels like there is no privacy at all. When you open the french window for a fresh air you hear every conversation on the parking lot and in the yard and you can be seen by anyone from there. Not a comfortable feeling.

We did n’t use any of the facilities except the restaurant but found the experience satisfactory. The hotel is well run with very friendly and efficient personnel. The ventilation in the kitchen of the Landhouse is not effective and the kitchen smells pervade the ground floor corridors. My wife and I had very redden eyes every morning which returned to normal after leaving the hotel. We are both 70 and have never experienced this before. We suspect that we had some sort of allergy to the washing powder liquid used for the bed lining. There was no bar soap or shower cap in the room. We were surprised that there were no coo fee and tea families in the room. This is standard in most 4 5 Star establishments.

Hotel was very pleasant but room was a little tired and will need modernising. Setting of the hotel and location. Room was a bit tired. Also TV was on a side wall that was not easily viewed. Breakfast was very expensive with no option for Continental Breakfast only.

Hotel was very pleasant but room was a little tired and will need modernising. Setting of the hotel and location. Room was a bit tired. Also TV was on a side wall that was not easily viewed. Breakfast was very expensive with no option for Continental Breakfast only.

Amazing place for a stay with kids even if a bit out of town. Amazing place spacious rooms very friendly staff who were ready to meet our demands. gorgeous breakfast nice dine options. the pool amazing watrm water ideal for kids to spend some energy. Located ona tranquil par even if closeness to the airport means you may hear a plane or two when outside no noise in the romslocation is a bit far from the city centre aprox 15 17 km so it takes a while to get there by eithe rpublic transportbus S train. or by car we usually had to drive 20 30 min to reach top destinations in town. no water cattle in the room.
Extremely Nice place Good food and a perfect bed. The wifi is not suited for streaming. Have a kid that wanted to see tv. No english childrens channels on tv only german.

Great place. Very spacious and comfortable suite perfect for our family of 4. Great location and beautiful grounds. Nice big pool and great variety for breakfast. No tea coffee facilities in the room minimal bathroom amenities. The suite has a small kitchen with a stove but not a single kitchen utensil. Housekeeping very basic. Nothing for kids.

Good. Clean and big rooms with fully opening windows. The ventilation system even when it was turned off was very noisy. The whole night a constant noise was coming straight from above and this was very irritating. The motor of the fridge was also noisy and it was not possible to unplug the appliance. No cotton buds or ear buds provided. We were a couple and we were provided 2 single beds which we had to push close to one another. Overpriced breakfast 22 per person taking into account this is not a central hotel.
